summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 2.1°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.5 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1475 m), light levels (up 8740 lux), feels like temperature (up 4.0°C), and outside temperature (up 3.4°C) when compared to today.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 765m and a peak of 2220m, averaging 1264.7m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, oppressively muggy and sticky. Drizzle or light rain possible, the clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected, and periods of sunshine are expected. Weather could become unsettled.
